title: Perform Customer Segmentation
description: Using customer purchase data, an agent must perform a simple RFM (Recency, Frequency, Monetary) segmentation.

tasks.description: For each customer in the dataset, calculate their Recency, Frequency, and Monetary value.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the three RFM metrics for each customer.

tasks.description: Assign each customer to a segment (e.g., 'High-Value', 'At-Risk', 'New') based on their RFM scores.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly applies the segmentation logic.

tasks.description: Generate a summary showing the number of customers in each segment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces an accurate count for each customer segment.
